Name: Awakened Oak
Text: Spells your opponent casts that can target this creature must target this.

Name: Evolve Scales
Text: Cast when a friendly creature is attacked. Give it +0 / +4 until end of turn.

Name: Recycle
Text: Destroy a creature. Your opponent adds the top card of their exile pile to their hand.

Name: Alarm Pheromone
Text: If you control an [Earth] creature, draw 2 cards.

Name: Hexed Arrow
Text: You cannot play this and a creature on the same turn. Deal 1 damage to a creature, and if it takes damage destroy it.

Name: Rainstorm
Text: Each player draws an additional card at the start of their turns.
